error.signature: TS4023: Exported variable 'X' has or is using name 'Y' from external module but cannot be named

verdict.summary: TypeScript cannot generate .d.ts files because an exported type references a type that is not accessible to consumers.

dead_ends.why_fails: Library consumers lose type information; defeats the purpose of TypeScript

workarounds.action: Explicitly export the referenced types so they are accessible
Add explicit return type annotations to exported functions

leads_to.condition: When declaration emit issues affect project references

preceded_by.condition: When augmented types are not properly re-exported

frequently_confused_with.distinction: TS2742 is about non-portable inferred types; TS4023 is specifically about declaration emit failing to name a type
